"The Beauty Salon":
"The Beauty Salon is a facility that lets you edit your character in all manner of ways, including body shape, hairstyle, skin color and texture, outfit and accessories.

Some items require a special pass item to edit, such as a Salon Pass or an N-Color change Pass."
"While you have a Premium Set active, you have a brief period of time after you pay to edit an aspect of your character to re-edit that aspect for free."
